general_feeling: At the beginning it was uncomfortable but I got used to it.
challenges: Some weird looks here and there but people reactions have never been a problem (even when people thought that it was a camera)
act_impact: Interactions with people I don't know were more difficult to initiate. Comfortable enough to work or exercise with
beh_adapt: In some quick interaction at shops I was holding them higher when making eye contact.  I overall noticed I would make less eye contact with people that I don't know
social: All my colleagues and friend that saw them for the first time asked me what was on the glasses and commented on my look in a funny way.
improvements: Smaller and lighter light sensor. Glasses are completely fine to me.
